title: Blazor Client-side Hosted ASP for authentication access to the application
body: I want to create an application with Blazor webassembly however I do have need for Active Directory to act as initial authentication based on Identity name. Can I use Active Directory on premises to get the user and user group then use JWT as a means to control the authorization afterwards? I was attempting this but only got as far as using JWT and roles based on the JWT token, but attempts to use User.Identity.Name on the controller fails to get the system user Identity currently.
